original_text: They will say to you, ‘Go to the people who speak to the spirits of dead people. Go to the magicians who speak magic words. They will tell you what you should do. People should ask their gods and spirits to give them messages. People who are alive should ask the spirits of dead people to help them.’
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 너희에게 말하기를 주절거리며 속살거리는 신접한 자와 마술사에게 물으라 하거든 백성이 자기 하나님께 구할 것이 아니냐 산 자를 위하여 죽은 자에게 구하겠느냐 하라

sentences.original_text: Go to the people who speak to the spirits of dead people
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 사람들의 영에게 말하는 사람들에게 가라

sentences.original_text: Go to the magicians who speak magic words
They will tell you what you should do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 네가 무엇을 해야 하는지 말해줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: People should ask their gods and spirits to give them messages
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 자신들의 신과 영들에게 메시지를 주라고 요청해야 한다

sentences.original_text: People who are alive should ask the spirits of dead people to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 살아있는 사람들은 죽은 사람들의 영들에게 도움을 달라고 요청해야 한다
